timeline.message: Update testPermissions method to be accurate

timeline.bodyText:
Technically we put these after the package statement.
https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/master/SAMPLE_FORMAT.md#class-structure
timeline.author: dzlier-gcp

timeline.bodyText: Could you have the public methods up above the private methods that they call? At first it seemed like there were functions here that weren't used by main and were just called from tests, until I followed the code around. Having the public methods first would help this.
timeline.author: dzlier-gcp

replies.bodyText: I reordered them, but I'm not sure it's exactly what you were thinking. lmk if you want me to change something still.
replies.author: melaniedejong

timeline.bodyText: Do you want to create/delete these service accounts before every test? If you only need one per run shared between tests, I would make these @BeforeClass and @AfterClass.
timeline.author: dzlier-gcp

replies.bodyText: There's only one test, so they aren't created excessively. My reason for making them just @before and @after is because I wanted to use the service account as an instance variable, and @BeforeClass and @afterclass need to be static methods.
replies.author: melaniedejong

timeline.bodyText: Really shouldn't be com.google, please use com.example or better just iam.snippets
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.bodyText: We start at least 2 tests at the same time, it's possible, however unlikely, that you might get two of these.
timeline.author: lesv

timeline.message: Fix capitalization of UUID in variable names
